```python

class SoftwareEngineer:

    def __init__(self):
        self.alias = "Pillows"
        self.aspiring = "Software Engineer"
        self.hobbies = ["Programming", "Reading", "Gaming"]
        
    def say_hi(self):
        print("Thanks for checking out my profile, I hope you find some of my work interesting.")


me = SoftwareEngineer()
me.say_hi()
```
